trophies.trophyName: We'll make a breakthrough eventually... And see what truth these Walls are hiding.
trophies.trophyDetail: Acquired all trophies.

trophies.trophyName: Don't worry... Just keep training.
trophies.trophyDetail: Got selected as the top performer during training in Episode 1 of the Story Mode prologue.

trophies.trophyName: This first step will be a big one for the human race.
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed Story Mode Chapter 1.

trophies.trophyName: What is it that you see?
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed Story Mode Chapter 2.

trophies.trophyName: What do you expect? The world is a cruel place.
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed Story Mode Chapter 3.

trophies.trophyName: Live a life that you can be proud of.
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed Story Mode Chapter 4.

trophies.trophyName: I'll wrap that around you as many times as you want.
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed Story Mode Chapter 5.

trophies.trophyName: He was a soldier who fought to the very end.
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed the final chapter in Story Mode.

trophies.trophyName: There's still so much I need to find out about the world.
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed 25% or more of the Scout Missions in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: What must be done.
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed 50% or more of the Scout Missions in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: I'll be the one to hunt those Titans to extinction!
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed all Scout Missions in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: We've got a talented one here.
trophies.trophyDetail: Achieved a Battle Rating of S in any episode.

trophies.trophyName: If you don't fight, you can't win.
trophies.trophyDetail: Achieved a Battle Rating of S in all Story Mode episodes.

trophies.trophyName: It's huge! What the heck is it?
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed your first Dire Elimination.

trophies.trophyName: I'm gonna destroy them! Every last one that's on this earth!
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed all Story Mode Dire Eliminations.

trophies.trophyName: We're always at an information disadvantage against the Titans.
trophies.trophyDetail: Reached 25% gallery completion in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: If you don't know about something, you just have to learn it.
trophies.trophyDetail: Reached 50% gallery completion in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: The outside world must be a hundred times bigger than inside the Walls!
trophies.trophyDetail: Reached 100% gallery completion in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: Hmm... Not bad...
trophies.trophyDetail: Leveled the protagonist to max level in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: Sorry, buddy, but I'm just a natural.
trophies.trophyDetail: Leveled one character to max rank in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: Devote your heart!
trophies.trophyDetail: Unlocked all characters in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: This attack will be the final blow!
trophies.trophyDetail: Successfully completed a Sneak Attack.

trophies.trophyName: I'm the deliverer of death!
trophies.trophyDetail: Eliminated a Titan with the Hook Drive.

trophies.trophyName: I know we can win this if we work together!
trophies.trophyDetail: Used a Buddy Action.

trophies.trophyName: I'm just glad it didn't turn out any worse...
trophies.trophyDetail: Saved 100 or more comrades.

trophies.trophyName: I was able to control myself perfectly.
trophies.trophyDetail: Avoided 100 Titan attacks.

trophies.trophyName: More... Must kill more...
trophies.trophyDetail: Eliminated a total of 1,000 enemies.

trophies.trophyName: My specialty is tearing through flesh.
trophies.trophyDetail: Got 2,000 total body part destructions.

trophies.trophyName: This is a true salute!
trophies.trophyDetail: Had over 100 allies join.

trophies.trophyName: This world has always been a living hell.
trophies.trophyDetail: Had over 100 allies die.

trophies.trophyName: It's great to have something you could put your life on the line for...
trophies.trophyDetail: Completed 100 Side Missions.

trophies.trophyName: Avoid unfavorable battles.
trophies.trophyDetail: Built 100 bases in battle.

trophies.trophyName: No need to hold back.
trophies.trophyDetail: Increased friendship rank.

trophies.trophyName: Don't be stupid. I've always been talkative.
trophies.trophyDetail: Leveled one character to max friendship in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: It's not so bad, being a goddess and all.
trophies.trophyDetail: Leveled all characters to max friendship in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: You mind if I take that?
trophies.trophyDetail: Sent 50 gifts.

trophies.trophyName: As long as we keep fighting, we've still got a chance.
trophies.trophyDetail: Used 1,000 Wings of Freedom.

trophies.trophyName: Just shut your mouths and invest everything in me!
trophies.trophyDetail: Used more than 100,000 Regiment Funds in total.

trophies.trophyName: No matter what you train in, it will serve humanity some day.
trophies.trophyDetail: Maxed out all training levels in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.

trophies.trophyName: Well, you see... It's just seething with rage!
trophies.trophyDetail: Maxed out the Titan Research Room level in Attack on Titan 2 / A.O.T. 2.
